faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Check out our Frequently Asked Questions

item_1.question: Are external libraries required by {{ProdShortName}} for document manipulation?
item_1.answer: {{ProdShortName}} works independently, no need for third-party software like Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, etc.

item_2.question: Can I test {{ProdShortName}} features before buying?
item_2.answer: Yes, {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial! Install it and try it out, but keep in mind: Trial versions add 'trial badges' to your documents, only the first 3 pages are processed. Want the full experience? Get a free 30-day temporary license for full functionality. See details under [temporary license]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What license types are provided?
item_3.answer: Need a {{ProdShortName}} license? We've got options! Choose from licenses based on many options. Number of developers in your team. Deployment locations like single office or remote workplaces. Does end-customer distribution need to share the SDK/API with clients? Alternatively, there's a license for monthly usage: Pay only for what you use with metered plans. Dive deeper and find the perfect [price]({{PricingUrl}}).

item_3.content: {{ProdShortName}} SDK designed for Java grants new possibilities for your Java applications and business files.

index-content-net.head_title: C# .NET Document Watermark Software | add watermark
index-content-net.head_description: C# .NET Library to add, search and remove watermarks in documents: PDF, Word, Excel, presentations, Visio diagrams, email and image file formats.
index-content-net.title: Watermark documents easily in your C# .NET applications
index-content-net.description: Empower your C# solutions with a flexible document watermarking API that provides adding customizable watermarks to all popular document formats.
index-content-net.overview_description: API to put watermarks on documents via .NET

overview_feature_1.title: C# files watermark
overview_feature_1.description: Add watermarks to your business files using {{ProdShortName}}. Use text, images, diagrams or email attachments.

overview_feature_2.title: Customize watermarks to your goals
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} software allows to customize watermarks in various ways. Text styles like bold, italic, font types along with image properties like rotation etc. enrich watermarking process.

overview_feature_3.title: All popular file formats are supported
overview_feature_3.description: Many file and document formats are supported by {{ProdShortName}} solution. PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images like JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, Visio diagrams, emails etc. could be protected with our watermarks.

overview_feature_4.title: Search and update watermarks
overview_feature_4.description: Watermarks which are already presented in a document may be found and processed again. Modify text, style, images or remove revealed watermarks without extra efforts.

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
features.description: Protect PDF, Office, Images and other formats by watermark

feature_1.title: Documents watermarking
feature_1.content: Add or Remove Watermarks from a Particular Section or whole Document of Various File Formats.

feature_2.title: Style your watermark
feature_2.content: Customize various watermark properties like color, font, rotation etc.

feature_3.title: PDF hidden printing watermark
feature_3.content: Allocate Hidden Watermark to PDF that only Appears when Printing Document.

feature_4.title: Watermark only images in documents
feature_4.content: Watermark all Images in a Particular Section, Page, Slide, or Document.

feature_5.title: Process selected image frames
feature_5.content: Assign Watermark to only Particular Frames of a Multi-Framed Image.

feature_6.title: Attachments & shapes
feature_6.content: Set Watermark to all Attachments in an Excel Document & all Image Shapes in Slides.

feature_7.title: PDF objects
feature_7.content: Align Watermark to Bleed Box, Art Box, Crop Box, or Trim Box in PDF Document.

feature_8.title: Documents background
feature_8.content: Place Watermark or Remove it from the Background Images of Spreadsheet or Slides.

feature_9.title: Unreadable Characters Protection
feature_9.content: Protect Text Watermark using Unreadable Characters in Presentations.

feature_10.title: Search Watermarks in Documents
feature_10.content: Search Watermarks Based on Specific Parameters or by Combining Multiple Criteria.

feature_11.title: Search similar image watermarks
feature_11.content: Look for Image Watermarks that Resemble a Particular Image.

feature_12.title: Get document information
feature_12.content: Programmatically Extract Page Setup & Other Information for Supported Formats.

index-content-java.head_title: Java Watermark Library | add watermarks to documents
index-content-java.head_description: Native Java Software to add and manipulate text and image watermarks in PDF, Word, Excel, Presentations, Visio diagrams, email and images files.
index-content-java.title: Implement documents watermarking in Java projects easily
index-content-java.description: Enhance your Java applications with the ability to watermark files using the GroupDocs.Watermark library. Our API offers customizable watermarks for a wide range of popular file formats.
index-content-java.overview_description: Library designed for adding watermarks using Java technologies

overview_feature_1.title: Watermark Files via Java
overview_feature_1.description: Protect your business documents using {{ProdFullName}}. Add text, images, diagrams, or email attachments as watermarks to various file formats.

overview_feature_2.title: Customize Watermarks for Specific Needs
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers extensive customization options for watermarks. Adjust text styles (bold, italic, font) and image properties (rotation, etc.) to tailor the watermarking process to your specific goals.

overview_feature_3.title: Broad Format Support
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} seamlessly integrates with a wide range of file formats, including: PDF, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP), Visio diagrams, and emails. Enhance document security across diverse file types.

overview_feature_4.title: Effortless Watermark Search and Management
overview_feature_4.description: Efficiently manage existing watermarks within documents. Locate specific watermarks, modify their text, style, or images, or remove them entirely. {{ProdFullName}} simplifies the watermarking workflow.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}} : Features
features.description: Protect your files by adding watermarks. Supports various formats including PDF, Office documents, and images.

feature_1.title: Files Watermarking
feature_1.content: Add or remove watermarks from specific sections or entire documents for various supported file formats.

feature_2.title: Watermark Customization
feature_2.content: Customize your watermark's appearance with options like color, font, rotation, and more.

feature_3.title: Hidden Printing Watermark for PDF
feature_3.content: Add a watermark that only appears when printing a PDF document.

feature_4.title: Selective Image Watermarking
feature_4.content: Watermark all images within a specific section, page, slide, or entire document.

feature_5.title: Watermarking Specific Image Frames
feature_5.content: Apply watermarks to specific frames within a multi-framed image.

feature_6.title: Watermarking Attachments and Shapes
feature_6.content: Add watermarks to all attachments in Excel documents or all image shapes in Presentations.

feature_7.title: Watermark Alignment in PDF
feature_7.content: Align watermarks to different areas of a PDF document, including Bleed Box, Art Box, Crop Box, and Trim Box.

feature_8.title: Watermark by Background Images
feature_8.content: Add or remove background image watermark to Spreadsheets or Presentations.

feature_9.title: Protection with Unreadable Characters
feature_9.content: Protect Presentations using Text Watermark with Unreadable Characters.

feature_10.title: Search for Watermarks
feature_10.content: Get list of watermarks presented in file, using various parameters including regular expressions.

feature_11.title: Find Similar Image Watermarks
feature_11.content: Locate image watermarks that looks like a specific image.

feature_12.title: Extract Document Information
feature_12.content: Get various document data like page setup for supported file formats.

index-content-nodejs-java.head_description: Node.js solution protect business documents with text and image watermarks. Popular formats like PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint are supported.
index-content-nodejs-java.title: Access to watermarking technology in Node.js via Java solutions
index-content-nodejs-java.description: Protect your intellectual property and prevent unauthorized copying with this Node.js solution. It allows users to easily add watermarks to business documents in various formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images etc.
index-content-nodejs-java.actions_main: Use NPM to download for free
index-content-nodejs-java.code_title: Add watermark to PDF with TypeScript

overview_feature_1.title: Node.js File Watermarking
overview_feature_1.description: Protect your business documents with {{ProdFullName}}. Add text, images, diagrams, or email attachments as watermarks to various file formats.

overview_feature_2.title: Customize Watermarks for Your Needs
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides extensive customization options for watermarks. Fine-tune text styles (bold, italic, font) and image properties (rotation, etc.) allow to customize documents processing.

overview_feature_3.title: Comprehensive Format Support
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} seamlessly integrates with a wide range of file formats, including: PDF, MS Office like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images such as JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, Visio diagrams, emails etc. Empower documents processing to achieve business goals.

overview_feature_4.title: Powerful Watermark Search and Update
overview_feature_4.description: Get and update existing watermarks in watermarked documents. Modify text, style, image content, or remove them entirely. {{ProdFullName}} provides wide range of the watermarks processing.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}}: Feature Set
features.description: Empower robust document security through programmatic watermarking. Supports diverse file formats including: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and image formats (PNG, JPG, etc.).

feature_1.title: Precise Watermarking Control
feature_1.content: Precisely manipulate watermarks by adding or removing them from specific sections, entire documents, or individual attachments and shapes within different file formats.

feature_2.title: Customization of Watermark Appearance
feature_2.content: Exert fine-grained control over watermark aesthetics by modifying attributes like color, font, opacity, rotation, and positioning within the document.

feature_3.title: Print PDF Watermarking
feature_3.content: Deploy a stealthy watermark that remains invisible during regular document viewing but becomes apparent only during the printing process, enhancing document security discreetly.

feature_4.title: Specific Image Watermarking
feature_4.content: Watermark specific images within a document using our solution. Choose to embed watermarks in a designated section (e.g., page, slide) or across the entire document.

feature_5.title: Multi-Frame Images Watermarking
feature_5.content: Apply watermarks selectively to specific frames within a multi-frame image format, ensuring granular control over watermark placement.

feature_6.title: Comprehensive Content Protection
feature_6.content: Extend protection to various document elements like attachments within Excel documents and image shapes within Presentations, providing an additional layer of security.

feature_7.title: Advanced Watermarking in PDF
feature_7.content: Watermark different areas of PDFs, including Bleed Box, Art Box, Crop Box, Trim Box etc.

feature_8.title: Background Image Watermarking
feature_8.content: Manage watermarks within the background images of Spreadsheets and Presentations, offering additional customization options for visual security measures.

feature_9.title: Text Watermark with Unreadable Characters
feature_9.content: Employ unreadable characters within text watermarks embedded in Presentations, bolstering security by making unauthorized watermark extraction significantly more challenging.

feature_10.title: Advanced Watermark Search
feature_10.content: Utilize comprehensive search capabilities to locate watermarks within documents based on specific parameters or by combining various criteria, enabling efficient retrieval and management.

feature_11.title: Similar Image Watermark Detection
feature_11.content: Find similar watermark images within documents that visually resemble an source image.

feature_12.title: Programmatic Document Information Extraction
feature_12.content: Extract valuable metadata programmatically, including page setup details and other document information for supported file formats.
